description: Retrieves information about a component type.

parameters.name: workspaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace that contains the component type.

parameters.name: componentTypeId
parameters.description: The ID of the component type.

nested_items.name: workspaceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the workspace that contains the component type.

nested_items.name: isSingleton
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether an entity can have more than one component of this type.

nested_items.name: componentTypeId
nested_items.description: The ID of the component type.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the component type.

nested_items.name: propertyDefinitions
nested_items.description: An object that maps strings to the property definitions in the component type. Each string in the mapping must be unique to this object.

nested_items.name: dataType
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The underlying type of the data type.

nested_items.name: nestedType
nested_items.description: The nested type in the data type.

nested_items.name: allowedValues
nested_items.description: The allowed values for this data type.

nested_items.name: booleanValue
nested_items.description: A Boolean value.

nested_items.name: doubleValue
nested_items.description: A double value.

nested_items.name: integerValue
nested_items.description: An integer value.

nested_items.name: longValue
nested_items.description: A long value.

nested_items.name: stringValue
nested_items.description: A string value.

nested_items.name: listValue
nested_items.description: A list of multiple values.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: relationshipValue
nested_items.description: A value that relates a component to another component.

nested_items.name: targetEntityId
nested_items.description: The ID of the target entity associated with this relationship value.

nested_items.name: targetComponentName
nested_items.description: The name of the target component associated with the relationship value.

nested_items.name: expression
nested_items.description: An expression that produces the value.

nested_items.name: unitOfMeasure
nested_items.description: The unit of measure used in this data type.

nested_items.name: relationship
nested_items.description: A relationship that associates a component with another component.

nested_items.name: targetComponentTypeId
nested_items.description: The ID of the target component type associated with this relationship.

nested_items.name: relationshipType
nested_items.description: The type of the relationship.

nested_items.name: isTimeSeries
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the property consists of time series data.

nested_items.name: isRequiredInEntity
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the property is required in an entity.

nested_items.name: isExternalId
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the property ID comes from an external data store.

nested_items.name: isStoredExternally
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the property is stored externally.

nested_items.name: isImported
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the property definition is imported from an external data store.

nested_items.name: isFinal
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the property definition can be updated.

nested_items.name: isInherited
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the property definition is inherited from a parent entity.

nested_items.name: defaultValue
nested_items.description: An object that contains the default value.

nested_items.name: booleanValue
nested_items.description: A Boolean value.

nested_items.name: doubleValue
nested_items.description: A double value.

nested_items.name: integerValue
nested_items.description: An integer value.

nested_items.name: longValue
nested_items.description: A long value.

nested_items.name: stringValue
nested_items.description: A string value.

nested_items.name: listValue
nested_items.description: A list of multiple values.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: relationshipValue
nested_items.description: A value that relates a component to another component.

nested_items.name: targetEntityId
nested_items.description: The ID of the target entity associated with this relationship value.

nested_items.name: targetComponentName
nested_items.description: The name of the target component associated with the relationship value.

nested_items.name: expression
nested_items.description: An expression that produces the value.

nested_items.name: configuration
nested_items.description: A mapping that specifies configuration information about the property.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: displayName
nested_items.description: A friendly name for the property.

nested_items.name: extendsFrom
nested_items.description: The name of the parent component type that this component type extends.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: functions
nested_items.description: An object that maps strings to the functions in the component type. Each string in the mapping must be unique to this object.

nested_items.name: requiredProperties
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: requiredProperties
nested_items.description: The required properties of the function.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: scope
nested_items.description: The scope of the function.

nested_items.name: implementedBy
nested_items.description: The data connector.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Lambda function.

nested_items.name: isNative
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the data connector is native to IoT TwinMaker.

nested_items.name: isInherited
nested_items.description: Indicates whether this function is inherited.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the component type was created.

nested_items.name: updateDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the component was last updated.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the component type.

nested_items.name: isAbstract
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the component type is abstract.

nested_items.name: isSchemaInitialized
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the component type has a schema initializer and that the schema initializer has run.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The current state of the entity, component, component type, or workspace.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The error code.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The error message.

nested_items.name: propertyGroups
nested_items.description: The maximum number of results to return at one time. The default is 25.

nested_items.name: groupType
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: groupType
nested_items.description: The group types.

nested_items.name: propertyNames
nested_items.description: The names of properties.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: isInherited
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the property group is inherited from a parent entity.

nested_items.name: syncSource
nested_items.description: The syncSource of the SyncJob, if this entity was created by a SyncJob.

nested_items.name: componentTypeName
nested_items.description: The component type name.

nested_items.name: compositeComponentTypes
nested_items.description: This is an object that maps strings to compositeComponentTypes of the componentType. CompositeComponentType is referenced by componentTypeId.

nested_items.name: componentTypeId
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: componentTypeId
nested_items.description: This is the componentTypeId that this compositeComponentType refers to.

nested_items.name: isInherited
nested_items.description: This boolean indicates whether this compositeComponentType is inherited from its parent.
